item.description:
Same format as last time. This is a nice spot to jam. I'm going to set the RSVP limit at 6, but if it fills up and you play a horn or guitar (you can use my amp) or any instrument that takes up little space (like vox), send me an email or call, and I'll clear it with Greg. As usual, we need at least drums and bass.

Feel free to bring snacks, charts, beer, or cd's. If you want to play a specific tune that is not a standard, please bring charts unless it is something simple like a blues or rhythm changes.

The last jam went very well. Let's make this one even better.
item.name: Sunday Jam!
